蘮字的基本解释

蘮
jì
〔蘮蒘（
r?）〕古书上说的一种植物，似芹，可食，子大如麦粒，俗称“鬼麦”。

蘮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jì］
［《廣韻》居例切，去祭，見。］
见“蘮蒘”。

蘮字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蘮； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1070第12
【唐韻】【集韻】?居例切，音罽。【玉篇】蘮蒘，似芹。【爾雅·釋草】蘮蒘，竊衣。詳蒘字註。【王逸·九思】蘮蒘兮靑蔥。　又【集韻】【類篇】?其例切，音偈。義同。

蘮字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蘮字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Stubborn
jì
〔蘮蒘(
r?)] A kind of plant mentioned in ancient books, like celery, edible, seeds as big as wheat grains, commonly known as "ghost wheat".

["Guangyun" cuts the case, go to the festival, see. ]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　蘮; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 1070 Page 12
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Juju cut, sound 罽. 【Jade articles】蒮蒘, like celery. 【Erya·Shucao】Tingwan, stealing clothes. Detailed note of the word 蒘. 【Wang Yi·Nine Thoughts】Come onion and green onions.　 [Ji Yun] [Class Chapter]? Its example cuts, sound verses. The same meaning.
